DataSourcePortable.Name: LEITURASULCOS
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT 
 A.RECURSO, 
 A.CENTRODEMANUTENCAO, 
 A.MARCAFOGO, 
 A.CODIGO, 
 B.NOME, 
 A.POSICAO, 
 A.VIDAUTIL, 
 A.DESGASTEACUMULADOVIDA, 
 D.NUMERO, 
 D.DATAULTIMALEITURA, 
 D.PROFUNDIDADE, 
 D.PRESSAO, 
 D.TEMPERATURA, 
 D.VIDA, 
 A.HANDLE AS HANDLEPNEU, 
 D.HANDLE, 
 E.HANDLE AS HANDLESULCO, 
 D.NUMERO AS SULCO
FROM 
 MA_RECURSOPARTES A 
 INNER JOIN MF_MODELOPNEUMEDIDAS B ON B.HANDLE = A.MEDIDAS 
 INNER JOIN MF_PNEUVIDAS C ON A.HANDLE = C.PNEU AND A.VIDAUTIL = C.VIDA 
 INNER JOIN MF_PNEUVIDASULCOS D ON D.VIDA = C.HANDLE 
 LEFT JOIN MF_LEITURASULCOS E ON E.SULCO = D.HANDLE
WHERE 
 E.DATA = (SELECT MAX(F.DATA) 
 FROM MF_LEITURASULCOS F 
 WHERE F.SULCO = D.HANDLE)
ORDER BY 
 A.MARCAFOGO, 
 D.DATAULTIMALEITURA ASC
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="RECURSO" From="A" Path="RECURSO" /> <Field Alias="CENTRODEMANUTENCAO" From="A" Path="CENTRODEMANUTENCAO" /> <Field Alias="MARCAFOGO" From="A" Path="MARCAFOGO" /> <Field Alias="CODIGO" From="A" Path="CODIGO" /> <Field Alias="NOME" From="A" Path="NOME" /> <DecimalField Alias="POSICAO" From="A" Path="POSICAO" FieldDecimalsFormat="0" /> <Field Alias="VIDAUTIL" From="A" Path="VIDAUTIL" /> <DecimalField Alias="DESGASTEACUMULADOVIDA" From="A" Path="DESGASTEACUMULADOVIDA" FieldDecimalsFormat="0" /> <Field Alias="NUMERO" From="A" Path="NUMERO" /> <DateField Alias="DATAULTIMALEITURA" From="A" Path="DATAULTIMALEITURA" FieldDateFormat="DayMonthYear" FieldTimeFormat="HourMinuteSecond" /> <DecimalField Alias="PROFUNDIDADE" From="A" Path="PROFUNDIDADE" FieldDecimalsFormat="0" /> <DecimalField Alias="PRESSAO" From="A" Path="PRESSAO" FieldDecimalsFormat="0" /> <DecimalField Alias="TEMPERATURA" From="A" Path="TEMPERATURA" FieldDecimalsFormat="0" /> <Field Alias="VIDA" From="A" Path="VIDA" /> <Field Alias="HANDLEPNEU" From="A" Path="HANDLEPNEU" /> <Field Alias="HANDLE" From="A" Path="HANDLE" /> <Field Alias="HANDLESULCO" From="A" Path="HANDLESULCO" /> <Field Alias="SULCO" From="A" Path="SULCO" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
